channel.title: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?
channel.description: Idk if you did a legit console dump, but i'm not terribly sure how you obtained the code to build 500 servers ! :confused: :confused: :confused: Did you steal the code from the runescape windows cache, or from the old windows client ?!?!?! :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: btw- Iam curious george- iam curious, not a dumbass from jagex.

item.title: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“vamp256, post:30, topic:279615”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=368990.msg3070980#msg3070980 date=1261529212]
heres how they did it:

deep within the basement of runescape developers der was a guy named jerry. jerry was a regular old chap, until one day jerry decided to shove a psp up his ass. andrew gower was a witness 2 all of dis. so he got super horni and was liek yoo jerry u wanna anal seks and jerrys like NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO and then a jellyfish sat on andrew gowers penis then mitb snuck in the basement of andrew gower and stole his computer ???/// :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek:
[/quote]can’t argue with that logic[/quote]

Lol’d

Read full topic

item.source: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?

item.title: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:21, topic:279615”][quote author=Newty link=topic=368990.msg2793638#msg2793638 date=1242934796]
Jagex can’t shut this site down because techniclly they are not allowed to view it since doing so violates this sites terms of service, which you must agree to in order to enter.
[/quote]
BAM!
http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff[/quote]Lmfao, omg this is the best thing I’ve ever read.

[quote=“Jagex Representative”]We act for Jagex Limited. As you know our client has owned and operated
RuneScape, the well-known online multiplayer adventure game, at a
website at
runescape.com since 2001. There are currently some 4.1 million active
registered players of the game in over 15 countries. Our clientâ€™s
turnover
in its last financial year to March 2005 was in excess of Â£5 million
(approximately $9 million).

Our client owns Community Trade Mark E2942761, UK Trade Mark 2302308
and US
Trade Mark 2829952 for the word RUNESCAPE in classes 16, 25 and 41. Our
client also has common law rights (and/or under company name / unfair
competition law or equivalent) in the name RUNESCAPE deriving from its
extensive use outlined above.[/quote]

[quote=“moparisthebest”]I act for moparisthebest.com, As you may or may not know I have worked as a cashier at a grocery store since 2002, In my limited free time I run a website whose forums have no more than 1000 active members, divide that by your claimed 4.1 million active runescape players and you get the percentage of 0.02349% of your userbase, subtract the large portion of the members such as myself who have not played runescape for over a year and you see how many are left. My turnover last financial year to march 2005 was in excess of $2000 dollars, all of which went to my living expenses. If I liquidated all of my assets, which consists of a 1989 Chevrolet S10, my net worth would be around $1000 dollars.

I own the name moparisthebest, I fail to see how this infringes on any trademark that you own, please correct me if I am mistaken.[/quote]So much more respect for moparisthebest now.

Read full topic

Lol. The whole TOS thing means nothing unless backed by law, which I can tell you now that the one here isn’t. The only thing on that page that can be enforced is the site rules, I.E spamming, flaming, etc. As for the whole “JaGEx stay out,” that means nothing.
[/quote]www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

Yeah, I guess your right…[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 04:16:40 pm[/size][hr][quote=“mr arrows95”][quote author=Newty link=topic=368990.msg2793852#msg2793852 date=1242941386]

Lol. The whole TOS thing means nothing unless backed by law, which I can tell you now that the one here isn’t. The only thing on that page that can be enforced is the site rules, I.E spamming, flaming, etc. As for the whole “JaGEx stay out,” that means nothing.
[/quote]www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

Yeah, I guess your right…
[/quote][/quote]

item.title: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:5, topic:279615”]The client is the only thing taken from Jagex. The server’s are made completely from scratch by old user’s such as winterLove, and more recently, Palidino, etc.

Jagex can’t shut this site down because techniclly they are not allowed to view it since doing so violates this sites terms of service, which you must agree to in order to enter.[/quote]
Its not like the poorly written servers are going to put Jagex out of business.

ranger squad:

And the moment they try to sue us, we can say they shouldn’t be in here as it violates the tos.

I think they already have, Moparisthebest talked with Jagex’s lawyers and explained that private servers were for learning, not re-creating the game. And we never took credit for it.

Although i do think selling admin spots on a server for real money is against the law, that’s why MITB didn’t allow it.

Read full topic
item.source: How the hell did you steal the code from Jagex ?!?!?
